title: Provided further that this provision shall not bar development permission for the uses, otherwise permissible, in agricultural zone as per UDCPR within specified distance from gaothan mentioned in this regulation
clause_text: Provided further that this provision shall not bar development permission for the uses, otherwise permissible, in agricultural zone as per UDCPR within specified distance from gaothan mentioned in this regulation.
